desc: Gatluak's Jewelry | Our goal is simple, bring Africans together to positively impact each other. 🙌🏾❤️ We simply re-direct a fraction of your spendings 💸 over a weekend partying, eating junk food, etc and pool it. You could WIN a car, will positively impact another african + get a dope necklace! You can't go wrong.

layout.text: Every purchase is a chance to WIN A CAR &
